1.seasonStats: Key player for Burkina Faso U17 at 2025 FIFA U17 World Cup
1.clubStanding: New Stars FC — Burkinabè academy known for producing Arsène Kouassi (Lorient), Alio Souleymane (Nordsjælland)
1.notes: Imposing 1.93m frame with defensive maturity beyond his age. One of the standout defenders at the U17 World Cup in Qatar. Profile validated by multiple European scouts.

2.seasonStats: Played at youth level in Senegalese system before Milan move
2.clubStanding: Signed to Milan Futuro (Serie D pathway). Fee: €750k + bonuses (up to €2m total)
2.notes: Strong centre-back prospect. Attracted interest from Burnley, Ipswich, Barcelona, RB Leipzig, Lyon and Eintracht Frankfurt before Milan sealed the deal. Captain of Senegal U17 at the World Cup. Confirmed by Fabrizio Romano.

3.notes: Forward on our watchlist. Limited public intel available — scouting network sourced.

4.seasonStats: Featured at 2025 FIFA U17 World Cup for Ivory Coast
4.clubStanding: FC San Pedro — Ivorian Ligue 1 club
4.notes: Explosive, direct winger who attacks his marker with both feet. Brother of Gervinho (ex-Arsenal, Roma). Modern winger profile — can cut inside, cross, and shoot from either side.

5.contract: Pre-contract with Hammarby (partnership deal with Réal du Faso)
5.seasonStats: Starred at 2025 FIFA U17 World Cup — youngest player at the tournament (b. March 2010). Burkina Faso reached QF
5.clubStanding: Réal du Faso — top Burkinabè academy. Cannot move to Europe until March 2028 (turns 18)
5.notes: Likened to Didier Drogba. Generational talent with 10+ elite clubs tracking. Chelsea leading charge over Man United. Hammarby hold a pre-contract + partnership with Réal du Faso. Long-term deal — earliest move 2027/2028.

6.notes: Young prospect (b.2010) on watchlist. Limited public intel — scouting network sourced.

7.clubStanding: San Pedro FC — same club as Yao Hubert
7.notes: Midfielder on watchlist. Limited public intel available.

8.notes: Defender on watchlist. Limited public intel available.

9.seasonStats: Standout at 2025 CAF U17 AFCON and 2025 FIFA U17 World Cup for Mali. Wore #17
9.clubStanding: Players Dreams — rising Malian academy that has produced several Europe-bound talents
9.notes: Defensive midfielder known for his engagement and work rate. Initially headed for Randers FC trial, but Frankfurt swooped in. Villarreal and AS Monaco also expressed interest.

10.previousClub: Amitié FC (Thiès, Senegal) — club president: Demba Ba
10.seasonStats: 4 appearances at 2025 FIFA U17 World Cup (all starts). Senegal reached R32
10.clubStanding: Liverpool FC U21s under Rob Page. Fee ~£1m + add-ons
10.notes: Left-footed CB, 188cm. Compared to Kalidou Koulibaly — proactive defender who reads play. Strong in duels, comfortable playing out from the back. Minor medical issue on arrival — not long-term.

11.notes: Forward on watchlist. Limited public intel available.

12.seasonStats: Featured for Senegal at 2025 CAF U17 AFCON. Rated top 3 Senegal U17 prospect by AfricaFoot
12.clubStanding: Diambars FC — elite Senegalese academy (also produced Sidy Barhama Ndiaye → Liverpool)
12.notes: Extraordinarily effective dribbler. Very good in the last 30 metres. Trialled at Man Utd's Carrington (Sep 2025). Eligible for summer 2026 transfer. Needs to add physical size.

13.previousClub: Ugandan youth system → Aarhus GF (free transfer)
13.seasonStats: Playing in AGF U19 Boys League
13.clubStanding: Aarhus GF — Danish Superliga leaders. Transfer officially registered Feb 2, 2026
13.notes: Forward who attracted significant interest from PL and European clubs before signing professional terms with AGF. Free transfer.

14.notes: Midfielder on watchlist. Limited public intel available.

15.notes: Defensive midfielder on watchlist. Limited public intel available.

16.clubStanding: Réal du Faso — same academy as Tapsoba
16.notes: Goalkeeper on watchlist. Teammate of Asharaf Loukmane Tapsoba at Réal du Faso.

17.clubStanding: Génération Foot — one of Senegal's most renowned academies (produced Sadio Mané, Ismaïla Sarr)
17.notes: Goalkeeper on watchlist. Génération Foot pedigree is a strong indicator — the academy has an elite European pipeline.

18.clubStanding: Petro Luanda — one of Angola's biggest clubs
18.notes: Forward on watchlist. Playing at a top-tier Angolan club — good platform for visibility.

20.notes: Forward/right winger on watchlist (b.2007 — older in this cohort). Limited public intel available.

21.previousClub: Wally Daan FC (Thiès) — scored 15 goals last season
21.seasonStats: 4 goals, 1 assist in 12 apps — top scorer in Senegalese Ligue 1 2025/26
21.clubStanding: AJEL Rufisque — 1st place in Senegalese Ligue 1 (24 pts after MD13)
21.notes: Known as 'Jude'. DOB: 10 Jan 2009 (passport verified). Elegant and technically strong. Fenerbahçe in advanced talks (Feb 2026). AJEL valuation: €200k.
